column3: â€œBlue Magoo is actually a cross between Blueberry, Major League Bud, and Afgoo..The original magoo grower used to by my Ommp grower. The original strain comes from Portland, Oregon.â€

â€œSmoked a bowl in the shower while groovin out to some funky jams. Very unique smell and taste, fruity and delicious! Over all an amazing high. I was stimulated, giggly, and happy beyond belief. Helped loads for muscular and bone pain relief in my legs, all aching gone and a great time to boot! I was easily active but no anxiety at all. A comfortable, pain and anxiety free time.â€

â€œMigraine pain 4-5; nausea 6-7 when I medicated round 2200 or so? Takes bout 5 min to start working. Pain/nausea gone. No anxiety/paranoia (a must for me). Head high energetic; definitely a daytime med. Body high very nice; just what I needed. Got a kick outta the tight buds & red hairs; high quality for sure. Almost couldn't go to sleep but did manage to pass out round midnight or so. Highly recommend for daytime use...â€

â€œI've suffered from true migraines since I was a child (for over 40 years) and I've recently come to MMJ for relief because I can't stand the prescriptions and I can't have caffeine (which works great for migraines but I'm allergic to). I researched and researched and decided to make Blue Magoo my first try.

When I was younger I smoked a lot for recreation, but I'm way past that, so I'm truly looking for pain relief....â€

â€œBlue Magoo looks and smells outstanding. The description on leafly is spot on, so I do not know what else to add other than to say Blue Magoo leans on the indica side of things. It is also worth noting that I did not get the munchies while medicating and it wasn't overly harsh, which is a welcome change from some of the harsh and heavy indicas I have been coming across lately. Overall 9.5/10. This strain also regular...â€

â€œStrain: Blue Magoo (DJ Shortâ€™s Blueberry / Major League Bud [Willyâ€™s Wonder F2] cross -- Hybrid)

Method of Consumption: Herb Iron and small bong 
Smell: The Afghani background reigns true over the Blueberry to me. It is a complex and pungent combination that has that morning dew off of a fresh gr...â€

â€œLove its parent, DJ.. But wasn't as good as i expected. Blue Magoo from WAM Oil, good stuff, not as much flavor as expected and the high was shorter lived. Bit disappointed, but will try again. Good for people with anxiety, depression and headaches.â€
â€œThis strain has amazing bud structure and crystals. Very fluffy nugs and a good clean smoke ... Heavy on the head....â€

â€œThis is by FAR the best Blue Magoo around!! A super strong williams wonder phono it produced red/pink hues on the flowers! SOO DANK!! UGH! This dispensary had quality meds and SUPER NICE people working there! They're mad friendly and always willing to go the extra mile for every patient. They seem to know every patient by name which is amazing!â€

â€œWhen doing reviews on Leafly I do a broad overview of my feelings on each strain.  A full view of the strain based on a culmination of the many different experiences not broken down by each different percentage or dispensary.  In fact when first putting reviews on this site I would list all the dispensaries (sometimes 9 or 10) at bottom when asked for more details finally realizing they only posted the first one.  Ra...â€

â€œIf you're in a lot of pain but still want to be alert and functional, you might want to check this strain out ASAP. Blue Magoo has a great balance between Sativa and Indica properties that really do deliver the best of both worlds--pain relief without that lingering I need a nap" feeling. If you're needing to get work done around the house
column5: or simply just want to enjoy your day pain-free

column3: â€œNot quite my holy grail" of weed but not far from it. Definitely an exceptional strain that I have the pleasure of growing and smoking my own. In my opinion it is best at 10 weeks then cured for 3.

column1: I also call it "the cancer patients dream"

column2: get hungry (I mean REALLY hungry) no anxiety
column3: happy great smoke with up lifted head and good indica body buzzâ€"

â€œI am in love with Blue Magoo. 
It's a beautiful looking flower. 
It immediately lifts any depression, nausea and laziness from my body. You can see colors more vividly, and your mind starts working overtime. 
This is my go to day smoke. It is definitely an upper for me.â€

â€œSo sweet and satisfying. Blue Magoo seems to kick in immediately after inhale, and is soooo super effective for remedying nausea and lack of appetite. Plus anxiety attacks, night terrors, soul-draining stress, menstrual cramps, headaches...it's just an excellent strain all around. Plus it's super pretty, with the light blue sparkly crystal frosting. I highly recommend.â€

â€œThe first hit and I was in love with this strain! Taste was smooth, fruity and sweet to pine and herbal flavors. I had just two very small hits off a pre roll and the instant happy, relaxed euphoria took me to a lovely place where I no longer noticed the days worth of tension, anxiety and pain that had been bothering me when I got home from work. I enjoyed the flavors of my dinner so much and the interaction with our...â€

â€œVery very tasty! Blueberry/pine smell and taste, very smooth. Buds are like rocks, extremely dense and burn well. Plants have stout and sturdy branches, no problem supporting the buds. Very smelly plant. If you find a clone, buy it! I'm far from a professional grower, but I find my own bmg better than what's on the shelves I have sampled. The high is a good hybrid mix, not overly uplifting or couchlocked... But dont ...â€
â€œSelect Strains vape cartridge was 83% THC so only takes a few hits to feel the affect.  Very much a head high, felt more like an Indica.â€

â€œBlue Magoo is a clone only strain  originally from Oregon. It's genetics are Williams Wonder F2 (Major League Bud) X DJ Short's Blueberry.  Mostly purple buds with hints of pink throughout It has great bag appeal. The high from this strain is intense and crippling.â€

â€œIf you want to get stupid and slow, but cover up the pain this is your choice! If you get paranoid easily, this seems to be a good one to keep the 'paranoia bugs 'away. â€œBlue Magoo is showing up everywhere in the Seattle/Tacoma area. However, a small dispensary in Tacoma called Tacoma Way" has had Blue Magoo for a few years now. It is incredible. The look is magnificent
column4: the smell is orgasmic to your nostrils and the taste is truly amazing. Its sweet tasting with a heavy eye high but its social and functional if used moderately. A few tokes go a long way with a nice euphoric

â€œI have smoke Blue Magoo several time ,but you have go thinking there might be something better Irish Kush close ,well that's lifeâ€

â€œMy longtime stoner friend said that her favorite strain was Blue Magoo, so when I saw this on the menu at Glisan Buds I knew I had to go get some!

Blue Magoo smells like blueberry and dirt, like over ripe blueberries fallen and squished on the forest floor after a warm summer rain.  Mmmm tasty!!  This afternoon I started to vape some Blue Magoo, and have been running on even keel all day.

This hybrid strain and ren...â€

â€œAbsolutely amazing. Gave me a great tingly feeling immediately, super relaxing. I usually have to smoke a lot to feel much of anything, but despite this strains relatively low THC %, don't let numbers fool you. One hit, and I felt IMMEDIATE relief for both my pain and anxiety. Highly recommend. 

Only major side effect/draw back is severe dry eyes. Just keep some drops on hand Bc this strain is worth it.â€
â€œreally. smokableâ€
â€œgreat strain for many reason. helps with depression, insomnia, and pain reductionâ€

â€œBest all around bud for an experienced indica heavy hybrid lover. Smokable all day without cognitive difficulties. No paranoia, believe me, I have GAD and panic attacks and does not induce anxiety. Great body buzz, it will have your temples buzzing and legs tingling. A nice but functional head-high is also packed in there. This bud kept me from quitting and going back on prescription meds after bouts with anxiety whe...â€
â€œAmazing strain. Very effective for pain relief, and simultaneously very enjoyable. Great strain right before bed, although it made me giggle like a little girl.â€

â€œThis strain is my go2 for pain relief and mellowing out. I can still do stuff, but i'm not as concerned about time. But this is coming from a daily toker, who can take in high THC levels.. mine from Oregon Medigreen Dispensary  was at a 19% THC . Shout out to Sol Sisters Farms! Holla!â€

Additionally, regardless of dosage, I consistently raid the pantry. No snack is left untouched. Nomnomonomnom.â€

Blue Magoo for the win!â€

â€œtastes and smells good, while both are kinda mild despite. high is really nice, above average body high. makes the limbs feel numb and a slight head high on the onset. only thing keeping blue magoo from being a 5 star strain in my book is it really just isn't as potent as quite a few other indica dominant hybrids. at least not any blue magoo i have had. i can see this being very good for medical patients however.â€

It does have a bit of dizziness to it, and after three hours or so, it becomes a terrific sleep aid!â€
